review: I was very disappointed with the Fire Stick. I purchased a chromecast the se week as the Fire stick. I believed the Fire stick was better quality but I was most certainly wrong about that! The Fire stick would barely work! It would rarely connect to the wifi and if by some miracle it connected it would not stay connected. All of my other tablets and devices were connected to the wifi including the chromecast that worked each and every time I used it! the Fire Stick is just not a good product. It just simply does not work.
